mapper.sql: id, user_id, keyword, search_type, result_count, create_time
mapper.select:
SELECT MAX(id) as id, user_id, keyword, search_type, COUNT(*) as result_count, MAX(create_time) as create_time FROM t_search_history WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY user_id, keyword, search_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC, MAX(create_time) DESC
LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT keyword FROM t_search_history
WHERE create_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
GROUP BY keyword ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT DISTINCT keyword FROM t_search_history WHERE keyword LIKE CONCAT(#{prefix}, '%')
AND create_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_search_history sh2 WHERE sh2.keyword = t_search_history.keyword) DESC, create_time DESC
LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.delete:
DELETE sh1 FROM t_search_history sh1 INNER JOIN t_search_history sh2
WHERE sh1.id > sh2.id AND sh1.user_id = sh2.user_id AND sh1.keyword = sh2.keyword AND sh1.search_type = sh2.search_type AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, sh2.create_time, sh1.create_time) < #{minutes}
